SCREENSIZE_DOC: Folder for METER. Custom folders are in /data/INTERNAL/PeppyMeterBasic/Templates/ and must be named widthxheight-description, e.g., 800x480-metal.
CHOOSE_METER_DOC: Select the METER in the list
NBARCHANGE: Number of bars in METER changed! Now set to
METER_FOLDER_NAME: Can't determine screen size because the folder is not properly named! Must be widthxheight-description, e.g., 800x600-metal. No 'x' allowed in description! Please check!
BACKEND_SECTION_DOC: Select how the meter reads its audio data. Loopback uses ALSA; Camilla reads directly from a FIFO output.
BACKEND_MODE_DOC: Choose the audio source for the VU meter (Loopback or Camilla FIFO).
BACKEND_FIFO_PATH_DOC: The full path of the FIFO file created by Camilla (default: /tmp/basic_peppy_meter_fifo).
BACKEND_RATE_DOC: Must match the fixed samplerate in CamillaDSP (e.g., 176400).
BACKEND_FORMAT_DOC: Audio sample format, e.g., S16_LE, S24_LE, or S32_LE.
BACKEND_APPLY_FAIL: Failed to apply backend settings. Please check your configuration.
